quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Power has issued an order for waiver of Inter-State Transmission System (ISTS) charges on transmission of electricity generated from _________ projects.
options: Solar power
New Hydro-power
Wind power
Geothermal power
Nuclear power

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of State for Education has informed about the various initiatives taken by the Ministry of Education for Psychosocial Health and Well-Being of Children. ‘Manodarpan Initiative’, which aims to provide psychosocial support to students, teachers and families was launched in which of the following years?
options: 2021
2017
2020
2019
2015

quiz.text: Mission LiFE (Lifestyle for Environment) launched by PM of India at COP26 has an objective of making atleast _________ of all villages and urban local bodies within India environment friendly by 2028.
options: 95%
85%
80%
90%
75%

quiz.text: During the 1st Sherpa Meeting of India’s G20 Presidency, the sherpas of different countries visited historical site ‘Kumbalgarh fort’ in ____________.
options: Madhya Pradesh
Maharashtra
Karnataka
Punjab
Rajasthan

quiz.text: Which of the following countries is/are not guest country(s) at India’s G20 presidency of 2023?
options: Sri Lanka
Bangladesh
Oman
Spain
3 and 4

quiz.text: India has collaborated with which of the following countries/organizations on projects like SINADE, IGnITE, QualIndia and iMOVE, to boost overseas mobility of the Indians?
options: UK
Germany
Japan
Australia
Norway

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Central Adoption Resource Authority (CARA)?

A.     Nodal ministry is Ministry of Women & Child Development.

B.      It is established under Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children) Act, 2011.

C.      It is not a statutory organization.
options: A and B
A only
B and C
B only
A, B and C

quiz.text: The ‘XYZ’ project was launched in which of the following years?
options: 2016
2018
2015
2021
2022

quiz.text:
The ‘XYZ’ project has been implementing incubation and acceleration programmes for women micro-entrepreneurs in which of the following states?

A.     Telangana

B.      Maharashtra

C.      Uttar Pradesh

D.     Manipur
options: A, B and D
A, B and C
C only
B and D
A, B, C and D

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the government has informed about the various initiatives taken by it to support and rehabilitate the elderly persons of the country. With respect to the same which of the following ministries run Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension (IGNOAPS) scheme?
options: Ministry of Health & Family Welfare
Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
Ministry of Rural Development
Ministry of Finance
1 and 2

quiz.text: Consumer Protection (Consumer Disputes Redressal Commissions) Rules, 2020 provides that no fees is required for registering cases in the District Consumer Disputes Redressal Commissions involving value of goods or services paid as consideration upto ___________.
options: Rs 1 lakh
Rs 50,000
Rs 2 lakh
Rs 2.5 lakh
Rs 5 lakh

quiz.text: Which of the following organizations has conducted the ‘SHE STEM 2022’?
options: Embassy of Finland in India
German Centre of InDecation and Research (DWIH New Delhi)
Atal InDecation Mission, NITI Aayog
1 and 3
2 and 3

quiz.text: SHE STEM hosted the #SHESTEM2022 Video Challenge, which was won by ___________.
options: T Shatananda Dhanwantari
G. Nivethiga Rani
Shreya Singh
Nistha Aswal
Gaurav Hanjoora

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the National Centre for Good Governance (NCGG) has started the 18th capacity building programme for Secretary Generals of Atolls Councils of Maldives at New Delhi. NCGG offers capacity building to civil servants of foreign countries in partnership with _______________.
options: NITI Aayog
Confederation of Indian Industry (CII)
Department of Administrative Reforms and Public Grievances
Ministry of External Affairs
1 and 2

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the bi-monthly meeting of the MPC of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) was chaired by Shaktikanta Das, Governor of RBI. How much is the MPC’s projection of retail inflation in FY23?
options: 6.7%
6.9%
6.5%
6.4%
7.1%

quiz.text: Some of the additional measures announced at the MPC meeting included widening the scope of Bharat Bill Payment System (BBPS). Scope of BBPS will be widened to include which of the following categories of payments and collections?
options: Recurring payments for businesses
Non-recurring payments for individuals
Recurring payments for NRIs
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Secretary, Department of Consumer Affairs (DCA) in a workshop has urged the States to establish the Price Monitoring Centres in all districts. The Central Government intends to achieve the target of having ___________ price monitoring centres by March 31st 2023.
options: 720
700
670
750
680

quiz.text: FDI inflows in India stood at USD 45.15 billion in 2014-2015 and have continuously increased since then, and India registered its highest ever annual FDI inflow of _____________ in the financial year 2021-22.
options: USD 77.77 billion
USD 74.74 billion
USD 87.87 billion
USD 94.84 billion
USD 84.84 billion

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the 5th edition of the _____________-India Competition Week was inaugurated at the Competition Commission of India (CCI) Headquarter, New Delhi.
options: Australia
African Union
European Union
Singapore

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of Agriculture and Farmer Welfare (MoA&FW) along with Melinda French Gates has inaugurated the integrated ______________.

Agriculture Investment Portal

quiz.text: Which of the following year was declared as the National Year of Millets by the Indian Government?
options: 2018
2020
2021
2023
2022

quiz.text: India is poised to become the global hub for millets with a production of more than 170 lakh tonnes which makes for more than __________ of the millets produced in Asia.
options: 74%
90%
67%
86%
80%

quiz.text: SRIJAN portal was launched in August 2020 with which of the following objectives?
options: to provide low interest credit to MSMEs
to help in skill development of fish farmers
to provide support to central government pensioners
to promote indigenization in defence production.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), Indian Railways (IR) has achieved a major milestone in freight transportation by crossing 1000 Million Tons (MT) mark in current Financial Year 2022-23. Which of the following was the biggest commodity (in %age terms) that the railways transported?
options: Cement and Clinker
Coal
Metals
Salt
Automobiles

282
152
182

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to WA?

A.     The Wassenaar Arrangement came into being in 1986.

B.      It has 42 members.

C.      In WA decisions are made by majority vote.
options: A and B

options: 2017
2015
2018
2012
2020

in first half (H1) of FY23 from H1 of FY22.

25%
30%
35%

options: Maharashtra
Tamil Nadu

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), National Institute for Health and Care Research, UK has given grant amounting ____________ to Public Health Foundation of India and University of Leicester for long term research in India and Nepal.
options: 100 million euros

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of External Affairs, India and Foreign Minister, Germany have signed a comprehensive migration and mobility partnership agreement. Which of the following provisions with respect to the agreement is/are incorrectly mentioned?
options: Agreement includes Academic Evaluation Center in New Delhi.
18 months extended residence permits to students.
30,000 job seeker visas annually.
Liberalised short stay multiple entry visas and streamlined readmission procedures.
None of the above
